name: Core Control (Bob Games)
description:
Core Control

A game by Giancarlo Massimo and Owen Shadburne, made in 3 days for Zeno Jam 2021. The theme was "I am everywhere."

A fast-paced shooter where there is no player: you are everywhere. Control an orb that can take over any enemy and fight with it. If the enemy you take over dies, you must find a new enemy before the timer runs out.

Controls

  • WASD to move
  • Arrow Keys or Left Click to shoot
  • T to toggle graphics settings
